title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different formats in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed differently in a dynamic text item compared to a data or text item.
EB: When inputting new Date() as content for three items, saving and previewing the page, the expected result is that all three items show the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text item show the same format, while the dynamic text item shows a different format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Input new Date() as content for three items.
2. Save the changes.
3. Preview the page.

Expected behavior:
The datetime values in all three items should be displayed in the same format.

Actual behavior:
The datetime values in the data and text item are displayed in the same format, while the datetime value in the dynamic text item has a different format.
